byline.original: By MIKE ISAAC and BRIAN X. CHEN

lead_paragraph: Google is set to unveil a payments initiative for merchants and a refashioned consumer app, while its rival reportedly plans a rewards program for Apple Pay.

headline.print_headline: Tech Giants Make Move in Mobile Payments
headline.main: Google and Apple Adjust Strategies on Mobile Payments

snippet: Google is set to unveil a payments initiative for merchants and a refashioned consumer app, while its rival reportedly plans a rewards program for Apple Pay.
abstract: Tech giants Apple and Google are each forging ahead full steam with mobile pay initiatives; Apple is poised to announce a rewards program for its mobile wallet service Apple Pay, while Google is expected to unveil its retooled mobile payment products.
